lead_paragraph: As the team physician for the Dream Team, Dr. David Fischer was up close with the most star-studded team ever assembled as they rolled through the Barcelona Olympics in 1992.

headline.main: Doctor Auctions Jordan's '92 Olympic Shoes, Dream Team Ball
headline.print_headline: Doctor Auctions Jordan's '92 Olympic Shoes, Dream Team Ball

snippet: As the team physician for the Dream Team, Dr. David Fischer was up close with the most star-studded team ever assembled as they rolled through the Barcelona Olympics in 1992....
